go_data.justification: TGFbeta2 led to some recovery of the inhibitory effect of Ab39 against endothelial-mesenchymal transformation in an AV explant culture.
A combined administration of antibodies (anti-TGFbeta1 and anti-TGFbeta3) to an AV explant culture inhibited mesenchymal formation, implying TGFbeta2's role in mesenchyme development.
